entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Westport
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:30 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.2°C

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
